33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Waqid Al-Laithi narrated that when the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) went out to Hunain he passed a tree that the idolaters called Dhat Anwat upon which they hung their weapons. They(the Companions) said:"O Messenger of Allah! Make a Dhat Anwat for us as they have a Dhat Anwat.' The Prophet (s.a.w) said: "Subhan Allah! This is like what Musa's people said: Make for us a god like their gods. By the One in Whose is my soul! You shall follow the way of those who were before you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لَتَرْكَبُنَّ سَنَنَ مَنْ كَانَ قَبْلَكُمْ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About 'You Shall Follow The Ways of Those Who Were Before You'
